articles.title: Caribbean nations fighting Covid-19 and readying for hurricanes - Prensa Latina
articles.description: Georgetown, Jun 10 (Prensa Latina) The countries of the Caribbean and Central America are accelerating their preparations for the new hurricane season this Wednesday with a new warning about their preparedness in the midst of the covid-19 pandemic.
